greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: McKay-Thompson series of class 18A for the Monster group with a(0) = -1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = -1..1000
formula: Expansion of eta(q) * eta(q^2) / (eta(q^9) * eta(q^18)) in powers of q.
Euler transform of period 18 sequence [ -1, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, 0, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, -1, -2, -1, 0, ...]. - Corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 06 2020
G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2)) where f(u, v) = u^4 + v^4 - u*v * ((u + v)^2 + 9*(u + v) + u*v * (u + v + 4)).
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ q^(-1) QPochhammer[ q] QPochhammer[ q^2] / (QPochhammer[ q^9] QPochhammer[ q^18]), {q, 0, n}] (* _Michael Somos_, Oct 23 2013 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<-1, 0, n++; A = x + x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) * eta(x^2 + A) / (eta(x^9 + A) * eta(x^18 + A)), n))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Mar 17 2004
ext: Edited for better readability and coherence. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 23 2013
